meaningMnemonic: You feel like a <radical>stone</radical> that’s been <radical>renew</radical>ed. How do renewed stones feel? <kanji>Stiff</kanji>. Very stiff.
readingMnemonic: You remember how you used to cure these <kanji>stiff</kanji> body times: your old friend <reading>こう</reading>いち would just massage them out for you.
